messages.message:
One request I have, when you create a new crafting sandbox, can it auto-configure
1. Account with user creating sandbox (in my case <mailto:anil@instabase.com|anil@instabase.com>) with password `changeme123` 
2. Create a commercial org Instabase 
3. Make user global site admin and org admin

1 => A default user is already created per the ADMIN_EMAIL env var. You can override this. The default is <mailto:noreply+admin@instabase.com|noreply+admin@instabase.com> for consistency across sandboxes.

2 => Yes

3 => See (1) -- that user is a site admin
Worth noting that you can also snapshot mysql after you've configured things the way you want, and then use that snapshot when you create new sandboxes.
